de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.job.util

Class JobSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.job.util.JobSequence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LongRunningMethod<java.lang.Boolean>

    public final class JobSequence
extends java.lang.Object
implements LongRunningMethod<java.lang.Boolean>
    Class for starting jobs. IRunners in a specific JobSequence are executed consecutively. IRunners in different JobSequences are executed independent of each other.
    It is possible to wait for a sequence to finish.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter

    • Nested Class Summary
